name: Rib Cage
effect:
:instant: Select 1 Spell card from you discard pile and put it back into your hand. Then, shuffle your discard pile back into your deck of Might and Magic.

— OR —

:instant: +1 :empower:
flavor_text: You trip over, what was, the rib cage of a large creature. Upon further examination, you discover the rib cage to be a piece of armor.
